title: Fix SSR incompatibility in TanStack viem config
Add end-to-end payment workflow tests
description: Test complete x402 flow: invoice -> payment -> settlement. Test with multiple payment backends (SQLite, Postgres, in-memory). Cover both incoming and outgoing payment scenarios.

title: Create regent-sdk documentation
Fix ERC-8004 IPFS registration tests failing due to missing PINATA_JWT
Add higher-level SDK initialization helpers (createRegentAgent)
Add SDK initialization helpers
description: Add higher-level createRegentAgent() function in regent-sdk umbrella package. Verify create-agent.ts and config.ts implementations are complete. Add examples for common patterns.

title: Add sovereign agent, tokenomics, and TEE documentation
Wire ERC-8004 SDK into regentx CLI
description: CLI has --skip-identity flag but doesn't actually wire erc8004Sdk into the RegentAgentManager. The manager.createManager() function only passes factory, not erc8004Sdk. Need to integrate @regent/erc8004 for identity registration during agent:create.

title: Fix SSR-incompatible viem config in TanStack adapter
description: TODOs in packages/cli/adapters/tanstack/headless/src/config/viem.ts and packages/cli/adapters/tanstack/ui/src/config/viem.ts indicate SSR-incompatible wallet configuration. Need SSR-compatible viem setup.

title: Create ERC-8004 integration guide with multi-chain examples
Create @regent/contracts package with factory interfaces
description: TypeScript interfaces and clients for Regent agent-creation contracts. Includes RegentAgentFactory interface, InMemoryAgentFactory mock, ViemRegentAgentFactory stub, contract ABI, and multi-chain addresses.

title: Create @regent/regentx CLI for agent management
description: CLI binary for managing Regent agents on-chain. Commands: agent:init, agent:create, agent:status, agent:list. Supports mock and on-chain deployment modes with regent.config.ts configuration.

title: Add test coverage for core adapter packages
Implement TEE uplift flow in SDK
description: The 5-step TEE uplift process is documented in documentation/concepts/tee-infrastructure.md but has 0% code implementation. Need: self-uplift API, state migration/checkpoint logic, attestation verification, key continuity handling. Critical for Use Case #5 (agent self-sovereignty).

title: Wire wallet resolution in regentx CLI
description: CLI commands use hardcoded mock owner (0x1234...) instead of resolving from wallet connectors. Need to integrate @regent/wallet package to resolve actual wallet addresses from connector IDs (local-eoa, thirdweb, etc).

title: Add end-to-end payment workflow tests for x402
Add missing package READMEs (8 packages)
description: Missing READMEs for: @regent/analytics, @regent/erc8004, @regent/express, @regent/hono, @regent/http, @regent/sdk, @regent/tanstack, @regent/wallet. Each should include quick start, features, API overview, and examples.

title: Add test coverage for adapter packages
description: Add tests for: @regent/core runtime, @regent/http extension, @regent/hono adapter, @regent/express adapter, @regent/tanstack adapter, @regent/analytics. Currently no test coverage for these packages.

title: Deploy Solidity IRegentAgentFactory contract
description: Deploy the agent-creation factory contract to testnets (Sepolia, Base Sepolia). Contract should implement IRegentAgentFactory interface with createAgent, getAgent, getAgentsByOwner, bond/treasury management. Update @regent/contracts addresses once deployed.

title: Add SDK documentation for agent factory and CLI
description: Created documentation/sdk/agent-factory.md and documentation/sdk/cli-reference.md covering architecture, usage, and CLI command reference.

title: Add cron expression support to scheduler
Create @regent/agents package with RegentAgentManager
description: High-level agent orchestration package composing factory, ERC-8004, and wallet. Includes RegentAgentManager class, RegentAgentConfig type, and support for tokenomics configuration.

title: Add x402 rake policy support for tokenomics
description: Extend @regent/x402 with X402RakePolicy interface. Allow PaymentTracker to read rake/treasury config from agent factory and apply revenue splits. Connect to agent-creation contract tokenomics settings.

title: Add missing README documentation for 8 packages
Fix ERC-8004 IPFS registration tests
description: 3 tests fail in packages/erc8004/src/__tests__/registration-ipfs.test.ts due to missing PINATA_JWT env var. Error: 'pinataJwt is required when ipfs=pinata'. Fix: Mock IPFS in tests, use environment-based test skip, or provide test fixtures.

title: Create ERC-8004 integration guide
description: Create comprehensive guide covering: multi-chain setup examples, IPFS configuration for agent metadata, feedback/reputation integration examples, and agent discovery workflows.

title: Create @regent/mcp package for AI agent tool definitions
description: Create MCP (Model Context Protocol) tool definitions so AI agents can use Regent SDK programmatically. Include tools for agent:create, agent:status, agent:list with structured JSON input/output schemas. Essential for Use Case #4 (AI agents using CLI).

title: Add scheduler cron expression support
description: Currently only 'interval' and 'once' schedules are supported. Add cron expression parsing for complex schedules using croner or node-cron library.

title: Complete ViemRegentAgentFactory on-chain implementation
description: The ViemRegentAgentFactory in packages/contracts/src/viemFactory.ts is currently a stub that throws 'requires additional setup'. Need to implement actual viem contract calls for agent creation, status, and management. Critical for CLI on-chain mode and production deployments.
